about_the_game:
Pilot your starship in Starship Fighters, a realistic space combat simulator. Engage in intense battles, explore vast galaxies, and unleash destruction with an arsenal of powerful weapons in a universe teeming with enemies!

About Starship Fighters

Starship Fighters immerses players in thrilling space combat across the vast universe. As a starship pilot, embark on intense missions that test your combat skills and strategy. Customize a variety of starships, each equipped with powerful weapons for scenarios ranging from dogfights to large-scale battles.

Key Features

Explore a detailed galaxy with diverse environments, from asteroid fields to alien planets, each offering unique tactical challenges. Engage in high-speed chases, outmaneuver enemies, and unleash powerful attacks to dominate the cosmos. With immersive 3D visuals and first-person action, Starship Fighters offers modes for endless replayability, delivering intense, adrenaline-fueled action in every battle.

content_descriptors.notes: There is a lot of shooting, explosions, and violence involved in the game, as it's fully focused on intense starship space combat. However, there is no blood or bad language involved.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (latest SP) 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 @ 3.0 GHz or higher (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 750/Radeon R9 270X or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 520 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible on-board
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (latest SP) 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i7 @ 4.5 GHz or higher (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1070 GTX / Radeon RX Vega 56 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 520 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible on-board
